title: Orange Soda
overview: Zhou Yu, a girl next door living in a small town, and Cheng Yuzhou, a rich young master who came back from a big city to prepare for the exam, met unexpectedly in the town, and the two fell in love with each other in getting along, and were forced to separate because of the families of the two sides... The love is separated by mountains and seas, can also be peaceful, and the two met again many years later, and all the love in their hearts gushed out and rushed bravely.
